metadata.label: Content description
metadata.value: This is a commercial letter addressed to two persons. Several towns in Syria and Egypt are mentioned and the letter refers to the purchase of papyrus and linen. The letter opens with the familiar remark that the sender is in good health (l. 4) followed by the announcement that he has received a letter from Cairo from the addressees before someone´s departure (l. 6). The addressees have been asked to buy papyrus and linen in a previous letter (l. 9), a request which is referred to in this letter together with some remark related to the seller and his leaving the town of Ramsin and arriving in Damascus (l. 10). Amounts of money (l. 11) and the sender´s partner are mentioned as well as several other place names.
